description: Dive into "Romantic Rotterdam: Love in Every Corner" — a handpicked list of places with quick notes, links, and essentials for fast trip planning and discovery.
title: Romantic Rotterdam: Love in Every Corner

places.generalDescription: Euromast is a must-visit TV tower in Rotterdam, offering breathtaking 360-degree views of the city. It features dining options and two luxurious suites, as well as thrilling activities like abseiling and a zipline. The tour around Euromast includes exploring various residential typologies, IT and media compounds, educational facilities, and sustainable projects such as the SAWA housing tower.

sources.snippet: Get a birds-eye view of Rotterdam from Euromast, the highest tower in the Netherlands. Reach sky-high views of 185 meters via an elevator, which was built during the Floriade event in 1960 – an annual gardening and floral exhibition famous in the Netherlands. Inside, enjoy a high tea experience (literally) as well as a fine dinner inside the restaurant sitting 100 meters above, or even consider booking a night inside one of the luxurious suites, offering incredible views of the city during a spectacular sunset, or glorious morning sunrise.
sources.shortName: 56 Fun & Unusual Things to Do in Rotterdam

sources.snippet: The Panorama Top Room of this hotel also offers a breathtaking view over the water, the skyline of Rotterdam, and the Erasmus Bridge, with even the Euromast in the distance. The most luxurious and romantic room at the Inntel Hotel is the Panorama Junior Suite. This suite has a private sauna, separate rain shower, and a whirlpool in the bathroom and is the most spacious suite in the hotel.
sources.shortName: Top 10 most Romantic hotels for a Marriage Proposal in Rotterdam

sources.snippet: The Euromast is one of the most iconic Rotterdam highlights and is unique in so many ways. It’s an iconic part of the Rotterdam skyline and offers some of the most beautiful views of the entire city. Take the hand of the person you love and take the lift to the top of the building, experiencing the city from a unique perspective.
sources.shortName: 5 romantic activities to do in Rotterdam during autumn

sources.snippet: The Euromast is one of Rotterdam’s most remarkable and iconic landmarks. But did you know you can also dine above the roofs of the city here?. The Euromast Brasserie is located on the observation deck of the tower at a height of 112 metres, making it the perfect restaurant to treat yourself to a high tea or dinner with a view.
sources.shortName: The most romantic things to do in Rotterdam on Valentine’s Day

sources.snippet: Built between 1958 and 1960 on the occasion of 1960 Floriade, an international exhibition and garden festival, this observation tower was originally 100 metres high. It became 180 metres high when a space tower was added in 1970.
sources.shortName: 23 Places to Visit in Rotterdam in 2025

sources.snippet: For some stunning views over Rotterdam (and beyond), head to the very top of the Euromast Tower. Make sure to book these tickets before arriving, as it can get busy at certain times of the year.
sources.shortName: 12 Best Things To Do In Rotterdam, Netherlands

sources.snippet: Het beste uitzicht (overdag dan) vind je natuurlijk in de Euromast. Voor minder dan een tientje kan je met de lift naarboven en krijg je een prachtig 360º uitzicht over de gehele stad.
sources.shortName: 73 Romantische uitjes & dingen om te doen in Rotterdam

sources.snippet: The Euromast is certainly not just for tourists; it’s also an original idea for a date!. Enjoy the view over the city together, or opt for a High Tea at 100 metres above ground.
sources.shortName: 25x Unique date ideas in Rotterdam
The 10 Best Rotterdam Attractions (Suggested By Locals)

places.name: Euromast

reviews.text: Staying in the Stars suite was a lovely experience.  Simple check in and staff escort you to your room and orient you.  The room is clean, well stocked, very large with king bed, sitting area, music system, coffee, fridge, and great soaking tub.  People are on the platform until 9pm which we thought might be weird.  The windows are mirrored, so people can't see in (except at dark outside with lights on inside).  The people watching was actually fun for us and added to the experience.  At night and morning, you have the deck to yourself which is just amazing.  Breakfast in the room was amazing.  If you are thinking maybe to stay and you can stretch your budget to make it work, it is worth every cent.  Loved our experience here.

Sure, it's cool and all, and there's even a nice interactive room to begin with showing how Rotterdam first started as just a pile of mud that people lived on. The view is really nice from up there, but there is the extra charge if you want to go really up the top and I thought the walk-in fare was expensive enough already.

But hey, I live in Malaysia where the currency difference is decimating my wallet, so maybe it's my poverty problem. I appreciate the beanbag chairs up the top where you can chill for a while. Yes, you gotta pay for the views but the views are worthwhile.

We travel frequently and have visited observation towers and viewing platforms all over the world. Euromast is one of our favorites. We loved the 360 degree panoramic elevator ride complete with light display. The views were breathtaking. We enjoyed the multi-level open air viewing decks as opposed to many others where you can only see the view through window glass.

places.generalDescription: Rotterdam Zoo, also known as Diergaarde Blijdorp, is a historic zoo established in 1857 and renowned for its successful breeding programs. The zoo features diverse themed areas such as the Asian section with a swamp forest and large aviaries, a Mongolian steppe, a bat cave, and a Chinese garden. Visitors can observe various wildlife including rhinos, lions, tigers, giraffes, gorillas, polar bears, penguins and elephants.

sources.snippet: Enjoy the Rotterdam Zoo, considered to be one of the most beautiful zoos in Europe, offering over 25 hectares of animals representing different regions of the world. Perfect for families with small children, kids will love exploring the zoo’s amenities from the Oewanja Kinderjungle playground to an exhilarating ride through the zoo on the Ret Jungle Express, to the petting zoo. When booking your ticket, visitors can reserve online and grab a discount rather than purchasing in person.
sources.shortName: 56 Fun & Unusual Things to Do in Rotterdam

sources.snippet: For an alternative date idea, Rotterdam Zoo is a great option. It’s located in the northwestern part of Rotterdam, about a 30-minute walk through mostly green space. It’s one of the oldest zoos in the Netherlands and is divided into several zoogeographic regions.
sources.shortName: 5 romantic activities to do in Rotterdam during autumn

sources.snippet: Located in the northwestern region of the city, the zoo was shifted to its present location after the original one was damaged in the WWII bombing. The zoo is also known as the Diergaarde Blijdorp.
sources.shortName: 23 Places to Visit in Rotterdam in 2025

places.name: Rotterdam Zoo

reviews.text: Great Zoo! The zoo was bigger than i expected, to get through it we walked around from 11:00 till 17:00. A big sealife area is present with lots of different types of animals. Then you have themes all around the park with animals there based on where they live in the world, recommended for couples and families!

The zoo is large and well kept with a lot of diversity of animals. The Oceania aquarium was very nice to see and you learn how a star fish eat/poo through pushing his stomach out of his mouth and how shark can smell underwater and more… take a lot of time if you want to see a lot as it's big.

Amazing place! Huge variety of species, lots of places to chill and enjoy and it is super clean everywhere. If you are planning to visit, take as much time as possible, less than 5 hours aren't going to be enough for a proper visit, because it is huge.

places.generalDescription: The S.S. Rotterdam offers a unique experience as a hotel, restaurant, and tourist attraction all in one. This former cruise ship turned hotel provides colorful rooms, free breakfast, and an outdoor pool for guests to enjoy. Visitors can book tickets for a dinnertime cruise on the pancake boat to get an overview of the city and its port. The Museum Rotterdam offers insight into the city's history with a one-hour overview.
places.name: SS Rotterdam

reviews.text: Lovely hotel. It really felt like we were on a cruise. Lovely room with a view, and friendly staff. Breakfast buffet was great and we had it every day. On the last night, we had dinner on the ship. It was delicious. Easy to get about. Water taxi from boat or bus stop nearby. We had a great stay.

It is always a pleasure to stay overnight here! It was my third time. The first two times were in 2015 and 2016. Great rooms with comfy bed. Good breakfast buffet. The only minus point was the extremely long time we had to wait for our bitterballen at the Captain's bar. We were the very first guests to give orders thus there was no reasonable explanation for this delay.

My wife and I really enjoyed this hotel. The location is excellent with water taxi service right onto the ship. Staff are very friendly and helpful. Great breakfast and restaurant. The Lido open air deck is fantastic! Our room was a suite which was very nice. Finally, free shuttle to the cruise terminal (at least when cruising on Holland America, not sure about other cruise lines).

places.generalDescription: The Dutch Pinball Museum in Rotterdam is a unique urban museum that showcases a diverse collection of modern and vintage pinball machines. Visitors can immerse themselves in the history of pinball, from pre-war machines to electromechanical ones from the 30s, as well as games from the 70s, 80s, 90s, and present day. The museum offers an interactive experience where guests can play on over 120 machines spanning different eras.

sources.snippet: Arcade game lovers will love checking out the unique Dutch Pinball Museum, housing a variety of collections of pinball machines to see and even play with. Check out some of the earliest versions of pinballs, dating back to pre-war pinball, electromechanical pinball machines from the 30s and onwards to pinball games from the 70s, 80s, 90s, and current day. Additionally, step by to see other cool pinball machines that are limited edition, such as the Gun’s and Roses collector’s edition pinball machine and The Big Lebowski (a pinball machine created in the Netherlands).
sources.shortName: 56 Fun & Unusual Things to Do in Rotterdam

places.name: Dutch Pinball Museum

reviews.text: A little piece of pinball heaven on earth <3 worth every penny. They also have cafeteria inside. But  remember! No drinks allowed upstairs which is perfectly reasonable because they keep those pinball in top notch condition. No one wants to spill anything on those beauties. The Staff is extremely friendly and always available for quick chat and They will help You with everything. They have some rarities like WCS94 rethemed to Kill Bill, 60th anniversary James Bond, music pinballs like Iron Maiden, GnR, Metallica and some really cool and unique stuff. They also have themed floors and a lot of looks like movie accessories. If I could i would move there. 11/10

Our second visit to the museum whilst on a cruise.

The two hour session ticket sounds awkward but actually ensures the museum doesn't get over busy while you're enjoying the machines.

The museum has a small history section with examples from all ages and upstairs actually has a section about the technology and how the machines actually work.

There is a massive and ever changing range of machines to play on once you're in and they are all included in the entrance fee.

A small cafe is also available downstairs and provides drinks and snacks / cake for your weary flipper fingers!

The museum is set in a beautiful little haven and is very picturesque with several good pubs and eateries within a couple of minutes walk!

Best pinball museum I've been to. Floors and floors of tables grouped together in themes. An entire day ticket wasn't really enough to do it justice, they've got about 100 well maintained tables including some real rarities. If I can swing another trip to the Netherlands, I'll definitely come back here.

places.generalDescription: Nestled to the east of Rotterdam's city center, Arboretum Trompenburg is a serene botanical garden spanning almost 8 hectares. Visitors can immerse themselves in a world of vibrant flowers, shady trees, and fragrant medicinal plants. The meticulously curated gardens showcase an impressive collection of trees, shrubs, perennial plants, and bulbs. Greenhouses offer further exploration into rare plant species from around the globe.

sources.snippet: Stop and smell the roses inside the Arboretum Tompenburg, offering a beautiful collection of perfectly manicured gardens and colorful flowerbeds, showcasing local flowers, shady trees, little shrubs, and more. Situated to the east of Rotterdam city center, check out the almost 8 hectares arboretum, showing visitors a wonderfully peaceful time learning about fragrant and medicinal plants, as well as exploring the multiple greenhouses. Another wonderful botanic garden to explore is Hortus Botanicus TU Delft, located only 16 minutes away from Rotterdam.
sources.shortName: 56 Fun & Unusual Things to Do in Rotterdam
12 Best Things To Do In Rotterdam, Netherlands

places.name: Arboretum trompenburg

reviews.text: A beautiful garden to visit. We went there in the Spring and there were so many trees and plants in bloom. Very peaceful, beautifully set out and cared for, with a huge variety of trees, and plants from around the world, including a cactus greenhouse. The garden also houses a shop/cafe at the entrance and a restaurant at the opposite end of the gardens where you can enjoy lunch. Well worth a visit!

Arboretum Trompenburg is a beautiful garden and flower museum that I really enjoyed visiting. The entrance is free, and you can go in through the little flower shop near the front. I spent a couple of peaceful hours walking around, enjoying the variety of trees, flowers, and birds. There are small bridges over canals that add a lot of charm to the place and make the views even more special.

There's also free parking available, which makes visiting even more convenient.

In one part of the garden, there's a large bird enclosure with finches, Chinese doves, quails, and a few other small birds. It's lovely to see them, although if you care about animals being free, it might feel a bit sad to see them inside a cage.

Overall, it was a great experience, and I'd definitely recommend it to anyone who enjoys nature and peaceful walks.

Really cute experience with a variety of flowers. We enjoyed just walking around and experiencing the atmosphere. A cat even greeted us, which made our day. It's kinda unnecessary that they have a bird cage, though.
The man that sold us the tickets was really cute. Super passionate and kind.

places.generalDescription: Het Park, established in 1852, is a picturesque English landscape-style park featuring a mini-golf course, benches, and a BBQ area. It offers an ideal setting for leisurely strolls or guided bicycle tours to explore the city's attractions such as the Cube Buildings, Old Harbour walkway, Maritime Museum's floating section, Walk of Fame with hand and footprints of notable personalities, Erasmus Bridge, and Euromast.

sources.snippet: Het Park is one of Rotterdam’s best parks right in the heart of the city. You can’t miss it as it is directly located at the foot of the Euromast observation tower. The park is inspired by English landscape-style parks, providing a romantic atmosphere for a day out.
sources.shortName: The most romantic things to do in Rotterdam on Valentine’s Day

places.name: Het Park

reviews.text:
If you're looking for a chill spot in Rotterdam, Het Park is a total must-visit. It's like a green escape right in the city – spacious, full of old trees, little ponds, and a super relaxed vibe. Perfect for a picnic, laying in the grass, or just strolling around with a coffee in hand.

Bonus? It's right next to the Euromast, so if you want to mix nature with a killer view, you're in the right place. And if you're into good food, there's a restaurant in the park called Parqiet – great vibes, solid brunch, and good coffee.

My and dog love this park ! We walk three times a week; the park is perfect for playing with the dogs. The park is well-maintained and clean. It's a great place for a picnic or just relaxing under a tree.

The best park in Rotterdam, immaculate atmosphere and very beautiful views.

Perfect for a date or a picnic with friends.

I highly recommend that you try parquiet if you end up visiting :)

sources.snippet: This date idea might sound cliché, but it doesn’t feel that way at KINO. This is because, in addition to the blockbusters, you can also watch art house films and real classics here. In addition, the entire cinema also looks very stylish.
sources.shortName: 25x Unique date ideas in Rotterdam

sources.snippet: De laatste tijd ga ik vaak naar Kino omdat de sfeer in het café erg goed is. Ideaal voor dates wat mij betreft.
sources.shortName: 73 Romantische uitjes & dingen om te doen in Rotterdam

reviews.text: What a beautiful classic art house cinema, such a nice place and locally owned. Also a great spot to have a drink and a nice burger.

This has to be one of my favourite spots in Rotterdam.
They have a nice bar, good kitchen and a beautiful seating area.

Of course I go very often with my cineville card, they screen all kinds of movies. From blockbusters to cult status B-movies to old classics and more.

Seats are comfortable and sound is great.

They've got such a great mix of movies here, from big blockbusters to little niche gems, and sometimes they even bring back old classics. You can tell they genuinely love cinema, it's not just business for them. The food bar's great too, and the burgers are seriously good. Oh, and no popcorn here, which somehow makes it feel even classier!

places.generalDescription: Rotterdam Central is the main railway station in Rotterdam, serving approximately 110,000 travelers daily. It has undergone significant growth and changes in recent years, creating more open spaces for shops and cafes to cater to visitors' needs. The station also features two supermarkets and underground bike parking facilities. Its striking architecture allows ample natural light to enter through spacious windows, with a distinctive pointy roof guiding attention towards the city center.

sources.snippet: Stop by the ever-changing Rotterdam Central Station, Rotterdam’s main transportation station, said to be a space that greets approximately 110,000 travelers daily, getting to their next destination. The station has been growing and changing in the last couple of years, creating more open spaces for shops and cafes to open up for visitor convenience, as well as expanded parking for guests and eco-friendly adjustments to continue the efforts for a green impact throughout the city of Rotterdam. Take note of its striking architecture, offering great light to enter through its spacious windows, as well as the pointy roof, said to guide the attention in the direction of the city center.
sources.shortName: 56 Fun & Unusual Things to Do in Rotterdam

places.name: Rotterdam Central Station

reviews.text: central station Rotterdam in Holland !that has exit for: metro, tram, bus, train, taxi, A station with modern design and super big! with shops and supermarket! 👍👏

Beautifully renovated train station. It also has stops for Metro, tram and bus connectivity. There are few shops as well for shopping. You cannot enter the main station without ticket as its required to open the gate.

It's a really big station and looks really nice. There are lots of place to sit and wait for your train. The outside looks gorgeous and perfectly designed also. The only thing that bother me is that the station can be sometimes a mes. And also the staff are really appreciative and kind but some of them can be harsh for no reason.

places.generalDescription: De Doelen is a renowned concert hall in Rotterdam, serving as the home of the Rotterdam Philharmonic Orchestra and hosting classical, world music, jazz, and pop performances. The venue also accommodates conventions. Situated at Stadhuisplein, it underwent renovations in 2009 and is currently undergoing a roof upgrade designed by Kraaijvanger Architects.

sources.snippet: What could be more romantic than an evening at De Doelen, as De Doelen has a wide choice of spectaculair performances. If there is nothing happening on Valentine's Day itself, since it falls on a Wednesday this year, check out what's on the schedule for the weekend. End the evening with a drink in the Stadsbrasserie Rotterdam, which is located in De Doelen.
sources.shortName: Date ideas for Valentine's Day in Rotterdam

sources.snippet: Als de ander van (klassieke) muziek houdt, zijn er in De Doelen altijd genoeg optredens om uit te kiezen. Overigens ook jazz & wereldmuziek. Er wordt in 2024 uitgebreid en aan de oostzijde van de Doelen gaan er veel café's open als het goed is.
sources.shortName: 73 Romantische uitjes & dingen om te doen in Rotterdam

places.name: De Doelen

reviews.text: I recently attended Flow Unplugged at De Doelen Rotterdam, and it was an incredible experience. The event was filled with a variety of talented performers, each bringing their unique flair to the stage. The atmosphere was intimate, which made the performances feel even more personal and engaging. I loved how diverse the acts were – from soulful acoustic sets to powerful vocal performances, every artist had something special to offer. De Doelen itself is a beautiful venue with great acoustics, which really enhanced the whole experience. Overall, it was a fantastic evening, and I can't wait to attend another event there!

Went for an orchestral nutcracker performance and was shocked at how large the building was. The seats are getting older and there isn't great leg room but the building as a whole is pleasant. Not much today.

The main concert hall in Rotterdam where local and more importantly world renown musicians perform be it classical, jazz, pop. The building is beautiful and the acoustics are extraordinary. Please try to catch a performance when you are in Rotterdam. Located within walking distance from Central Station

places.generalDescription: Nestled along the picturesque Maas River, Comedy Club Haug is a delightful spot for those seeking an entertaining evening in Rotterdam. While it may not boast an extensive dining menu, its charm lies in the intimate atmosphere and stunning views of the city's iconic bridges: De Hef, Willemsbrug, and Erasmus Bridge. This stand-up comedy haven captures the essence of New York's vibrant comedy scene while offering a unique experience that sets it apart from other local venues like WORM and Theater Walhalla.

sources.snippet: Comedy Club Haug is not a fancy restaurant for extensive dining, but it does offer the perfect setting for a romantic evening out with a spectacular view over the Maas. Located on the edge of the center of Rotterdam, directly on the Maas, the terrace has a breathtaking view of the city's three iconic bridges: De Hef, the Willemsbrug and the Erasmus Bridge. As Rotterdam's stand-up comedy club, Comedy Club Haug is a hidden gem in the city center, with an atmosphere reminiscent of New York comedy tents.
sources.shortName: 20x Most Romantic Restaurants with a view of the Rotterdam Skyline

sources.snippet: An unforgettable evening with a good dose of humor, that's what you get at Comedy Club Haug. Comedy Club Haug is located on the Boompjeskade, directly along the Maas. Every week there are (inter)national shows from Thursday to Sunday.
sources.shortName: Date ideas for Valentine's Day in Rotterdam

sources.snippet: You can’t always tell jokes, so it’s great when someone else makes you laugh. At Club Haug you can watch shows by well-known comedians or go to an Open Mic evening and be surprised. Discover even more active dates!
sources.shortName: Summer dates: romantic activities in Rotterdam
73 Romantische uitjes & dingen om te doen in Rotterdam

places.name: Comedy Club Haug

reviews.text:
01/12/2014 Daniel Arends

28/02/24 Kor Hoebe. We had a great big laugh this evening. Kor does crowd work. Which is difficult , but so funny. Great evening!!

08/05/24 Emmanuel Sonubi. The men is SO BIG and so so funny. There must have been people who laughed just in case though, :) Hope he'll be back sooner this time.

Loved the comedians and MCs I've seen perform there. Staff are efficient.
Only thing is that after a show ends, the end is a bit abrupt and we feel a bit like sheep being herded out 😂 I totally understand why as clearly there are many shows on (love) and they do this for maximum efficiency (love) but sometimes you want to chill in the same space you've just been entertained in.
This is in no way off-putting enough to counter the endless positives and I will definitely be back. Thanks for putting on great comedians in Rotterdam!
The host was more hilarious than the comedians. There were 4 comedians from all over the world. Some were more funny than the others. But overall, I enjoyed and had a great time.

places.generalDescription: Biergarten Rotterdam is a vibrant and seasonal venue that offers an extensive selection of craft and draft beers, along with delicious burgers and bar bites. This charming oasis combines the best elements of a German beer garden with the unique atmosphere of Rotterdam. The communal wooden tables create a welcoming environment where visitors can easily socialize. It has become a popular destination in the city, especially on Friday and Saturday nights when guests can enjoy drinks in the sun.

sources.snippet: Of course, most people from Rotterdam already know Biergarten, but it’s also a great place to bring your date. Close to the station with a casual atmosphere and enough space to sit, chill and watch people. On Fridays it’s always way too busy, but during the week it’s wonderful for a date, as you can actually sit down.
sources.shortName: 6 Great places for a date in Rotterdam

sources.snippet: Als je de ander na zijn of haar werk wil verrassen, haal hem dan op en ga direct naar de Biergarten. In de lente en zomer is het meestal van 16:00 tot middernacht open en bij je biertje kan je ook nog een hamburger krijgen van de BBQ.
sources.shortName: 73 Romantische uitjes & dingen om te doen in Rotterdam

places.name: Biergarten

reviews.text: Good vibes, tasty food. Really enjoyed the radker we ordered with homemade beer. It's a great place to hang out with friends over the weekend. Will definitely get back next time in town.
Beautiful venue, nice beers and there is a kind staff in every bar

Nice spot to grab a beer and relax with friends. Only reason I am giving it 4 is because I don't like the fact that the beer I was served was in a plastic glass, doesn't taste as good.
Great atmosphere for a Friday after work

places.generalDescription: De Ballentent is a charming and cozy port pub in Rotterdam, known for its old-school ambiance and specializing in meatballs. The restaurant attracts a mix of older locals catching up over beers and snacks, as well as young Rotterdammers, families, and visitors looking to enjoy the famous meatballs and the view of the Nieuwe Maas river. In addition to their renowned meatballs, De Ballentent also offers other sandwiches and pancakes on their menu.

sources.snippet: De Ballentent, a true Rotterdam concept, is a no-nonsense wooden harbor pub with a good dose of Rotterdam down-to-earth and humor. From the terrace you have a beautiful view of the quay with moored ships and the impressive Wilhelminapier. The audience is often as typically Rotterdam as the view itself!
sources.shortName: 20x Most Romantic Restaurants with a view of the Rotterdam Skyline
Best quiet outdoors romantic date places in Rotterdam/best plekken voor een rustige romantische date? : Rotterdam

places.name: De Ballentent

reviews.text: A nice spot near het park with a great view of the river. The indoor space is small and cozy, but there's plenty of outdoor seating that's perfect for enjoying the nice weather. Here many people grab a bite or a drink after work, and the atmosphere is fun. We tried the meatballs, and they were absolutely delicious!

A cozy and inviting spot for lunch. Reservations are recommended during peak hours. The service was friendly, and the Christmas decorations added a lovely festive touch. The food was delicious, with portions surprisingly large compared to the prices. Definitely worth a visit!

De Ballentent is a charming and down-to-earth place right by the water in Rotterdam. One of the highlights is definitely the outdoor seating area - it's spacious, has a great view of the river, and is perfect for enjoying a relaxed meal on a sunny day.
Food is simple but good, I recommend the meatballs.  The prices are fair and the staff is friendly
I recommend.

places.generalDescription: Splash Tours BV offers a unique experience in Rotterdam, combining a bus and boat tour. The tour takes you through the city streets before transitioning onto the Maas river, providing an uncommon perspective of the city. Despite initial low expectations, visitors were pleasantly surprised by the extensive water portion of the tour and enjoyed the friendly and informative crew. The experience is highly recommended for its entertaining guides who provide information in multiple languages.

sources.snippet: It may look like a normal bus tour that takes you along the most special places in Rotterdam, but that’s not all!
sources.shortName: 25x Unique date ideas in Rotterdam

places.name: Splash Tours BV

reviews.text: I visited Rotterdam for a few days with my 7 year old daughter, and this bus was one of the most beautiful experiences for her! I highly recommend it! and the guide won us over from the first moment!

After traveling on land for a while, you enter the river and travel by bus in the river for 30 minutes. Rotterdam is quite limited in terms of activities. This amphibious bus is perfect for having a good time and exploring the surroundings. The employee gifted a small present to us kindly.

Unique & fun, especially for kids:
I did this tour with my 10-year-old, and the highlight was definitely when the bus drives into the water - kids love it and it's something different to try once.
You get nice views of the Erasmus Bridge and the SS Rotterdam ship, and the guide explains the landmarks well.

Some points to note before booking:
- The water route is short, and the bus moves slower than a normal boat, even though we are on water almost an hour

- Limited photo opportunities since it's a closed bus.

- At €30 per adult, some may find it a bit pricey for the experience.

Overall, worth trying with kids for the novelty factor, but less of a “must-do” if you're a couple and only looking for sightseeing.

places.generalDescription: Dudok in Rotterdam is known for creating the famous Dudok apple pie with a secret recipe, now found in many restaurants across the Netherlands. They also offer an extensive afternoon tea from 12:00 to 17:00 daily, featuring various teas from the renowned Betjeman and Barton tea company in Paris.

sources.snippet: Because we are not all pastry chefs, you can simply order a nice Do-it-yourself box from Dudok. With this box you can make the tastiest apple pie in Rotterdam at home in your own kitchen!
sources.shortName: 25x Unique date ideas in Rotterdam

places.name: Dudok

reviews.text: Nice afternoon experience.  Good fresh salads and, of course, great apple pie. Attentive service from Jamie made it even better.

Great place with plenty of food and drink options!
Last time we visited, we just had drinks and tried the corn ribs - something I hadn't seen anywhere else. They were delicious, especially the sauce on top, which added a really nice touch. Definitely worth trying!

Nice selection of sandwiches and small bites. I had the hummus sandwich with courgette on brown bread which was really tasty. The fries were fresh and crunchy as well. The home-made ice Tee is delicious too. Service is welcoming.

places.generalDescription: Located in the vibrant heart of Rotterdam on Witte de Withstraat, Restaurant Bazar is a lively and bustling eatery that brings together Middle Eastern and North African flavors. The restaurant's exterior may seem unassuming with its long terrace, but the interior is a feast for the eyes, adorned with colorful lamps, souk-style paneling, and vividly painted tables.

sources.snippet: If you want something different, try this Arabic fusion restaurant. Share hot and cold dishes like hummus, tabbouleh, and stuffed grape leaves before moving on to main menus like shawarma, kebabs, or tagine. And for a special touch, you can enjoy a glass water pipe on their outdoor patio while gazing at the stars together.
sources.shortName: 14 Best Rotterdam Date Ideas And Activities

sources.snippet: This loud, colorful restaurant in Hotel Bazar serves North African and Middle Eastern cuisine. It’s huge inside yet still somehow crowded. The lights, the music, and the enormous, flavorful dishes will transport you to a busy market in a far away place.
sources.siteName: Adventures in Gourmet - Discover your next foodie adventure.
sources.shortName: Why You Will Love Visiting Rotterdam

places.name: Restaurant Bazar

reviews.text:
Very beautiful restoration, perfect for the cozy dinner occasions. We went there because of good recommendations from other people, and we're not disappointed! Very delicious food and magnificent atmosphere! The prices are medium, but the quality of food is very good still! If you are searching for a restaurant with the great variety of healthy food, I think that is the perfect spot!
The food costed 17.90€ (on the picture)/ person
Tea 4.5€

It was an average vegetarian Dinner, but the service was very good. The restaurant is not very clean but if you want this cuisine then it is ok. We ate vegetarian (3/5) and my father ate meat (this looked better 4/5). So I would recommend to eat meat there :)
Thank you once again for the good service:)

Really lively buzzy place, we booked but had to wait for a table as it seems you can just rock up and sit at an empty table. Very busy when we arrived but calmed down quite quickly. We chose to sit outside as it was a nice evening but as non smokers that may have been an error when tables either side lit up when they had finished eating.
Food was good but wasn't hot, probably due to the poor service we received from our server. We mentioned when paying the bill and the manager/owner knocked 10% off as an apology which was decent of him. Menus available in several different languages which is good.

places.address: Witte de Withstraat 16, 3012 BP Rotterdam, Netherlands

places.generalDescription: Historische Tuin Schoonoord is a hidden gem in Rotterdam, located near the Euromast Park. Despite its central location, it offers a quiet oasis with unique plants, bee colonies, and charming carp-filled ponds. The garden provides a serene environment with benches to relax and enjoy the historical trees and plants labeled in Dutch. Visitors can escape the city's hustle and bustle to read a book or have a peaceful date surrounded by greenery.

sources.shortName: Best quiet outdoors romantic date places in Rotterdam/best plekken voor een rustige romantische date? : Rotterdam

places.name: Historische Tuin Schoonoord

reviews.text: Quite a few people on TikTok highlighted this place as a hidden gem worth walking to and through - it did NOT disappoint. A beautiful, tranquil green space to visit on a date, or to simply enjoy peace & quiet.

Tucked within The Park (het Park) where the Euromast is located.....an oasis of tranquility in the middle of the bustling city. Ideal for strolling especially during dry sunny days...The entrance is at Kievietslaan.
Nice a calm small garden. A real hidden gem.

places.generalDescription: BY AMI Rotterdam is a stylish venue located on the Kop van Zuid, offering a delightful terrace with scenic water views. The restaurant boasts an eclectic menu featuring global cuisine made from organic and sustainable ingredients. Diners can indulge in a variety of starters, main dishes, and delectable desserts such as the highly recommended rolo cheesecake. The establishment's beautifully designed interior adds to the overall dining experience, making it an ideal spot for enjoying a meal with loved ones.

sources.snippet: By Ami in Rotterdam offers a unique and colorful dining experience, perfect for a romantic night out. The restaurant stands out with its beautifully decorated interior and a menu that embodies a creative mix of various cuisines. Here, you and your partner can enjoy organic and sustainable dishes that are not only delicious but also a feast for the eyes.
sources.shortName: Romantic Dining in Rotterdam: A Guide to Enchanting Locations

places.name: BY AMI Rotterdam

reviews.text: By Ami is a true gem on the culinary map of Rotterdam! We spent a lovely afternoon there, enjoying a delicious chicken dish served with a syringe – not only was it full of flavor, but the presentation was also delightfully surprising. The cocktails were fantastic and perfectly complemented the experience. The service was top-notch – our waiter Andrew was extremely professional, and the whole team was very friendly and attentive. We truly felt well taken care of. I highly recommend this place – perfect for a tasty and memorable afternoon! 🌟🍸🍽️

Fun interior design and friendly staffs
Main dish was good. The steak was more like a medium than medium rare though, but it was fine.
Starter was bit disappointing. Salmon and scallop were fun but the other one bit meh
Desert was good!

Cute place to sit, and take pictures. We tried the drinks, they were delicious and nice. The food was okay, nothing crazy and also a bit cold and soggy when it arrived. The taste of it was also nothing exceptional. The dessert we trued was the cheesecake which was really nice and good. Staff was friendly as well

places.generalDescription: If you're seeking a truly unique adventure, look no further than "Remastered," an extraordinary digital art experience that seamlessly blends technology and creativity. This immersive journey invites you to explore the minds of legendary artists like Van Gogh, Rembrandt, and Hieronymus Bosch across six captivating sections. Start your exploration in the Playground, where you can unleash your inner artist by creating drawings that are showcased on Europe's largest indoor screen.

sources.snippet: Remastered is an interactive, full-immersive, and sense-enchanting art experience, unlike anywhere else. It is the space where technology meets art, and it takes visitors on a ride through the images, as well as the minds of the genius artists who created such art. Divided into 6 different sections: Playground invites visitors to create a drawing, and have it be displayed on the biggest indoor screen in Europe as you play with it, Underworld takes visitors swimming in the blue waters alongside schools of fish, while Drip-Cave and Elevator take you from land/sea to the clouds up above, Overworld gives images of life in the clouds, with the birds, and so much more.
sources.shortName: 56 Fun & Unusual Things to Do in Rotterdam

sources.snippet: For example, go to this cool interactive experience in Rotterdam: Remastered. In this attraction you will be taken on an audiovisual journey for an hour and you will become one with the art.
sources.shortName: 25x Unique date ideas in Rotterdam

places.name: REMASTERED

reviews.text: An exhibition beyond words! A psychedelic experience smoothly merged with art that everybody should taste! I wish I had the opportunity to visit as a daily dose of relaxation and joy. One minor criticism, one wouldn't expect the lockers to be charged. You can still keep your bag infront of you, but still. And a friendly reminder, don't panic if you see the doors closed some time before your reservation, the same staff also assists you through the exhibition, thats why they close doors during an exhibition.

Sep 24, Saturday: very crowded..the exhibition is like a tour - in one hour you pass through different rooms without an option to return. Even if number of visitors per tour is limited, you can't just relax and sit on a bench to enjoy the exhibition..it would be nice to have more chairs/mats/whatever to sit or to lay on instead of standing the last 20 min show..recommended as a nice option to spend an hours at a new digital art center, but not a must if you've already been to similar attractions before. They have fun activities for kids while waiting for entering the tour. Lockers 2€ are available.
I really liked the place. It's a good experience even for people not into arts. Really enjoyed. Very interactive and fun

places.generalDescription: De Tuin is a great place to enjoy Rotterdam's beautiful surroundings. The terrace offers stunning views of the Kralingse Bos and the lake.

sources.snippet: Restaurant De Tuin van de Vier Windslagen, located on the edge of the beautiful Kralingse forest and directly on the glittering Kralingse Plas, offers an enchanting ambiance for a romantic evening out. With a beautiful terrace and a warm interior, De Tuin is an ideal place to stay in both summer and winter. Housed in a stately mansion from 1867, the restaurant offers breathtaking views of the Rotterdam skyline reflected in the water, making it highly recommended.
sources.shortName: 20x Most Romantic Restaurants with a view of the Rotterdam Skyline

sources.snippet: Geniet van het uitzicht over de Kralingse plas en lunch 's middags in het zonnetje bij restaurant De Tuin in Kralingen.
sources.shortName: 73 Romantische uitjes & dingen om te doen in Rotterdam

places.name: Restaurant De Tuin van de Vier Windstreken - Restaurant in Rotterdam

reviews.text: We came to this restaurant for some drinks and dinner, and we loved it. The place is beautiful and elegant, and of course the lakeside location makes it stunning. In addition to the indoor seating, there are tables right by the lake water, which makes it enjoyable during the warmer months. I definitely recommend coming here when the weather is nice.

Beautiful restaurant & with a great view by the lake.

At first it was weird that there were no prices on the drink menu, more exactly for the beer menu. When I asked for the price of my beer the waitress told me a completely different price (with a 2€ difference), something I didn't really understand.

Another thing was when we ordered the fries, she told us they can only make the loaded fries. No problem until we see that those "loaded fries" are not on the menu as well and of course, the price is higher than it was for the normal fries.

Besides these little things that felt like a scam, really, the view is really nice, it was sunny and beautiful. A lot of stairs to climb to reach the toilet which for the "premium" experience they pretend they are offering..the bathrooms are pretty dirty :)

Overall the food (the “borrel hapjes”) is a 5-6/10.

We had the:
- Yakatorie; these were so bad. The taste, the texture. A big NO. The lady told us that, that's how it comes from there supplier. So I guess change the supplier? -> 2/10
- Loaded fries; they served this almost cold to us, very disappointing. -> 6/10
- Veg bitterballen; was okey. -> 6/10

The view in a sunny dat is beautiful. Would only come for the view.

We paid €45 (incl. Drinks). Which was quite expensive for the quality we got.

places.generalDescription: Jazzcafé Dizzy is a long-established and informal café located in Rotterdam, offering a cozy atmosphere for both young and old visitors. It is known for its low-key live music performances, making it a great spot to unwind while enjoying good jazz music in the background. The venue hosts great performances every week, creating a perfect setting to relax with food and drinks. Visitors can expect to experience an eclectic mix of music genres from talented bands while savoring delicious food and quality wine.

sources.snippet: Sometimes the conversation is a bit over and then you just want to enjoy each other’s presence. In that case you can visit Dizzy. Wonderful music that you can fully absorb.
sources.shortName: 6 Great places for a date in Rotterdam
73 Romantische uitjes & dingen om te doen in Rotterdam

places.name: Jazzcafé Dizzy

reviews.text:
I go often to this Jazz bar and it is the best one in Rotterdam, there is always a great band playing and a nice atmosphere.
There have many options for dinner with a reasonable price.
I recommend to make a reservation otherwise you might not have a table or a nice spot to watch the show.
You have to pay to see the concert but it is a fair price and super worth it.
The atmosphere is great. Drinks are more on the expensive side but still very good. It's a great place to go if you want a relaxing evening with a few friends!

On Wednesday they have a free jazz night. They ask for donations but you choose how much and it's well worth it!!! Get there a tiny bit early to find a table in case it's full. Really nice atmosphere. They have both food and drinks.

places.generalDescription: Museum Rotterdam is a comprehensive institution dedicated to the history of the city. Its collection spans 10,000 years, showcasing artifacts from prehistoric times to the present day. The museum explores themes such as work, immigration, and religion, connecting the past with contemporary life in Rotterdam. Visitors can view a wide range of objects including skull fragments from early settlers, timbers from the first dam across River Rotte, and modern fashion designs by local talents.

sources.snippet: The interactive installation Giant Billiard (1970) in the Kunsthal. Photo by Kim Longwood. I love to visit exhibitions myself, but that’s off course even more fun with some company.
sources.shortName: Summer dates: romantic activities in Rotterdam

places.name: Museum Rotterdam

reviews.text: A very interesting museum, that deals with its subject matter really well. Staff are absolutely fantastic and as non-Dutch-speakers we were given materials and guides in English, encouraged to ask for anything we wanted further information on, and treated to a video showing in English when they had a moment to put it on for us. Worth a visit.

Apparently the only bit of Rotterdam Museum at the moment, but as a student of WW2 in the Netherlands I was very happy

A fine selection of items showed WW2 in Rotterdam from Mein Kampf to Liberation. There  are interpretation boards in Dutch giving more detail. A separate room showed decisions after WW2 on saving or tearing down key buildings. Special mention to the 2 chaps staffing today who were charming, helpful and spoke perfect English 👍😊

Really interesting museum, as others say it is small but well laid out with lots of individual items from the time. The staff were extremely helpful, played the video in english for us, and provided translated material. They even made sure we didn't get caught up with the school group, which was much appreciated.

places.generalDescription: Kaapse Maria is a modern buvette located in the city center of Rotterdam, housed in a historic building. It is an extension of Kaapse brouwers and offers a delightful culinary experience paired with craft beer, natural wines, and other collaborative products. The bar boasts 24 beer taps and an open kitchen that serves creative dishes.

sources.snippet: Once you set foot in Kaapse Maria, you immediately feel relaxed because of the interior and a wonderful living room vibe and then we haven’t even mentioned the delicious (local) beers and delicious wines. Choosing the traditional drinks at the bar gives you enough to talk about, you can’t go wrong with names like ‘Mooi & Meedogeloos’ (translation: Beautiful & Relentless). It’s also the ideal place to order a bite with your drink.
sources.shortName: 6 Great places for a date in Rotterdam

sources.snippet: Another great location with fantastic ambience and delicious beers is Kaapse Maria, one of the gastropubs of the Kaapse Brouwers. Here you can find 24 different beers on tap, accompanied by live music on the weekends and beer tastings. Located in a historical building, the pub offers scrumptious and creative food as well as a big selection of wines.
sources.shortName: The most romantic things to do in Rotterdam on Valentine’s Day

places.name: Kaapse Maria

reviews.text:
A Hidden Gem for Foodies

This cozy local bar exceeded our expectations with its exceptional food. The shared plates were a delightful culinary journey, showcasing fresh, locally sourced ingredients in innovative yet simple dishes. The balance of flavors was impeccable, and the presentation was stunning.

The atmosphere was warm and inviting, making it the perfect spot for a special occasion. The carefully curated selection of craft beers and spirits complemented the meal perfectly. We were pleasantly surprised by the dry, not-too-sweet taste of the natural orange wine we paired with our dinner.

The attentive and knowledgeable staff made us feel welcome from the moment we arrived. If you're seeking delicious nouveau cuisine, a great atmosphere, and friendly service, this restaurant/bar is a must-visit.

Great craft beers and good food. The atmosphere is great, as are their seating options. You can always ask for recommendations as their staff is very knowledgeable.

It is also a good venue for private events (upstairs).

Highly recommended

Horrible food. Unfortunately i did not take a photo, but we ordered the "Charcuterie" which is basically a very small portion of cold cuts of dubious quality for EUR 18.00 and doesn't even come with a piece of bread. Ridiculous.  Those are their "honest" ingredients? Cheap cold cuts with small pickled cucumbers from AH?
Guys you should change the menu and just serve more basic food but perform better.

places.generalDescription: Nestled in the Millennium Tower within the Marriott Hotel, The Millèn is a refined restaurant located on the first floor. Its elegant ambiance and romantic panoramic view of Rotterdam Central Station through ceiling-high windows offer an enchanting dining experience. Chef and owner Wim Severein's culinary masterpieces, which earned The Millèn a Michelin star shortly after opening, feature pure seasonal ingredients that result in a regularly changing menu.

sources.snippet: In the heart of Rotterdam, on the first floor of the Marriott Hotel in the Millennium Tower, is the refined restaurant The Millèn. Here you immerse yourself in an atmosphere of timeless elegance, while being embraced by a romantic panoramic viewview through the ceiling-high windows overlooking the iconic Rotterdam Central Station. This enchanting view captures the essence of the city, allowing you to enjoy the culinary masterpieces of chef and owner Wim Severein with your loved one.
sources.shortName: 20x Most Romantic Restaurants with a view of the Rotterdam Skyline

places.name: Restaurant The Millèn

reviews.text: Fabulous dining experience. The food is outstanding, in fact, it's out of this world. The chef has a talent for the use of very unique mustards from all over the world. And the limoncello soaked sponge cake is just something to die for. You got to try it.

Great experience at The Millèn: good service, food (the haddock is fantastic!). Glutenfree options / variations were so perfectly blended that it seemed to eat a regular menu. Good price for quality. Great choice of local and european wines.

Food was not bad, but for a michelin starred place it should have been better. We had the 8 course meal and some dishes had too powerful of a taste others like the stake were a bit on the weaker side.
Wine pairing was clearly not up to par at least with expectations but they did have some nice wines to offer.
Service was good, no complaints there for sure; we were there with a bigger group and it was reasonably fast.

places.generalDescription: Located in Rotterdam, Netherlands, BACKYARD is a popular hotspot that promotes a sustainable future with a focus on plant-based food. The restaurant offers a delectable breakfast menu until 4:00 pm featuring locally roasted coffee, overnight oats, green smoothie bowls, avocado toast, and more.

sources.snippet: This plant-based health food restaurant has an urban environment with a cute, backyard look and feel. They call themselves “Rotterdam’s backyard,” the quintessential place to pop in to meet a friend, grab a quick bite, or even for a date. I only had a drink here, but the food on the menu sounded really good!
sources.siteName: Adventures in Gourmet - Discover your next foodie adventure.
sources.shortName: Why You Will Love Visiting Rotterdam

places.name: BACKYARD

reviews.text: After a full day, we opted for the 3-course menu and made the perfect choice! We wanted to have some peace and quiet, enjoy our meal and recover from the stressful day, which worked out 1 to 1! The restaurant was almost empty as most people were upstairs (a creative workshop was taking place there), which worked in our favour. We decided to go for the respective courses and I have to be honest, the starters blew me away! The hummus was just perfect and looking at someone else's order I could tell that the portions outside of the course menu were huge! I was more than full after the smaller portion! The burgers were also very tasty, as were the desserts! The service was very nice and attentive and we had a great time there! Definitely worth a visit if you enjoy good vegan food!

As a Rotterdam tour guide I was happily surprised by this all-vegan lunchroom in the city center. The food was pretty good, fairly priced and that staff was kind as well. Though, I am strongly against the trend where the menus are English only (so not in native Dutch). My nephews needed translation help, while they're in their home city. Which is ridiculous in my opinion..

The breakfast itself was really good - especially the plant-based options, fresh and nicely presented. The place is clean and tidy, but the service was very slow; at one point people were even shouting to get the staff's attention. Outdoor seating is available, though not very cozy, and the overall vibe isn't particularly kids-friendly. Great food, but the atmosphere and service leave room for improvement.
